hemibrainr 0.1.0
  • Reference

Reference

Package Help

Provides an overview of the package

hemibrainr-package

hemibrainr: Code for working with data from Janelia FlyEM's hemibrain project

General skeleton functions

hemibrain_reroot()

Re-root a neuron/neurons

primary_neurite()

Retrieve the primary neurite (cell body fibre) for a neuron

hemibrain_skeleton_check()

Pre-process hemibrain skeletons

hemibrain_overlap_locality()

Calculate the overlap score between a neurons axon dendrite

Neuronal compartments (axons, dendrites)

flow_centrality()

Determine a neuron's dendrite and axon by calculating flow centrality

plot3d_split() nlscan_split()

Plot neurons split up by flow centrality

axonic_points() dendritic_points() mixed_points() primary_dendrite_points() axonal_endings() dendritic_endings() axonic_endings() primary_dendrite_endings() axonic_cable() dendritic_cable() arbour_cable() unsure_cable() primary_dendrite_cable()

Extract axonic/dendritic points/cable from a neuron/neuronlist

hemibrain_compartment_metrics()

Get useful metrics for each neuron's axon and dendrite

hemibrain_split_points()

Get the positions of key points in a 'split' neuron

Synapses and meshes

hemibrain_extract_synapses() hemibrain_extract_connections()

Extract synapse location and labels from a neuron/neuronlist

hemibrain_remove_bad_synapses()

Remove incorrectly placed synapses

hemibrain_roi_meshes()

Get all the region of interest meshes in the hemibrain project

hemibrain.surf

The hemibrain mesh
